div.p: I’d say the most significant turning point in my life was finding a proper relationship; I’ve had lots of girlfriends who were on-off and finding a girlfriend
that actually loved me for who I was and could take all the flack that comes with my life that meant everything to me and it was literally like
my life had turned a 360 and I was facing the other way and looking back up the hill; she really has changed my world.
